companyInfo.Competitors: Continental, Delphi, FCA Fiat Chrysler Automobiles

jobDescription: Job Description  Tasks & Responsibilities:  Evaluate and develop algorithms for manufacturing analytics use cases  Collaborate with data scientists and power users to refine metrics and tune models  Create concepts to scale solutions on big data  Implement and test distributed algorithms  Integrate solutions to platform code base Qualifications Required Qualifications:  Strong machine learning background, especially on feature selection, clustering, cost-sensitive learning, causal models  Experience with distributed systems and Apache Spark  Strong programming skills in Python  Strong research and problem solving skills  Good communication and teamwork Additional Information Degree Level: MS, PhD
